医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究可能为免疫系统受损患者的新疗法铺平道路贝尔法斯特女王大学领导的新研究在微生物学领域取得了突破，这可能会为免疫系统受损的人（例如囊性纤维化患者）开发新的治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230909/Study-could-pave-the-way-to-new-treatments-for-people-with-compromished-immune-systems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230909/Study-could-pave-the-way-to-new-treatments-for-people-with-compromished-immune-systems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4af7bfb1-b586-4bd4-a0d1-d9362e96ced6 Sat, 09 Sep 2023 06:13:00 -0400 Study could pave the way to new treatments for people with compromised immune systems
突破性试验可以改善高危骨髓瘤患者的诊断和生活结果最近发表在著名科学杂志上的一项新医学试验的结果可能会显着改善高危骨髓瘤患者的生活结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230909/Breakthrough-trial-may-improve-diagnosis-and-life-outcomes-for-病人-with-high-risk-myeloma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230909/Breakthrough-trial-may-improve-diagnosis-and-life-outcomes-for-病人-with-high-risk-myeloma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bcf4f450-3541-4fba-a45c-4f07bcf62020 Sat, 09 Sep 2023 06:10:00 -0400 Breakthrough trial may improve diagnosis and life outcomes for patients with high-risk myeloma
评估鼻内抗 CD3 治疗阿尔茨海默病的研究发表在《PNAS》杂志上Tiziana Life Sciences Ltd.（“Tiziana”或“公司”）是一家生物技术公司，通过新颖的药物输送途径开发突破性免疫调节疗法，今天宣布接受出版物“抗 CD3 单克隆抗体 (mAb) 的鼻腔给药改善“阿尔茨海默病小鼠模型中的疾病”，发表在著名期刊《美国国家科学院院刊》(PNAS) 上，该杂志支持 foralumab 的机制作为阿尔茨海默病 (AD) 的潜在治疗方法，阿尔茨海默病是一种难以治疗的神经炎症性疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230909/Study-evaluating-intranasal-anti-CD3-for-treatment-of-Alzheimere28099s-disease-published-in-the-PNAS-journal.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230909/Study-evaluating-intranasal-anti-CD3-for-treatment-of-Alzheimere28099s-disease-published-in-the-PNAS-journal.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32260363-1d36-4b77-8038-f04d3f1f352a Sat, 09 Sep 2023 06:08:00 -0400 Study evaluating intranasal anti-CD3 for treatment of Alzheimer’s disease published in the PNAS journal
伯明翰大学和 Acticor Biotech 宣布 MHRA 批准 LIBERATE 临床研究2023 年 9 月 7 日，伯明翰大学和 Acticor Biotech 宣布 LIBERATE 临床研究获得监管机构的全面批准。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230909/University-of-Birmingham-and-Acticor-Biotech-announce-MHRA-approval-of-LIBERATE-clinical-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230909/University-of-Birmingham-and-Acticor-Biotech-announce-MHRA-approval-of-LIBERATE-clinical-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0b8f0480-3896-4f86-8216-1217d4aa8d4b Sat, 09 Sep 2023 06:06:00 -0400 University of Birmingham and Acticor Biotech announce MHRA approval of LIBERATE clinical study
研究揭示了可能增加女性心血管疾病风险的早期生活因素先进的研究正在揭示可能的早期生活因素，包括贫困、身体或精神虐待，这些因素可能会影响绝经后女性的卵子流失率并增加患心血管疾病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230909/Research-shines-light-on-early-life-factors-that-may-increase-risk-of-cardioangio-disease-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230909/Research-shines-light-on-early-life-factors-that-may-increase-risk-of-cardiovian-disease-in-women.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51a0052a-2e1c-4858-9157-54f70f3e05d9 Sat, 09 Sep 2023 06:04:00 -0400 Research shines light on early life factors that may increase risk of cardiovascular disease in women
NFL 和美国心脏协会联手鼓励孩子们在学校积极活动在这个返校季，美国心脏协会和国家橄榄球联盟 (NFL) 与其 32 个 NFL 俱乐部合作，为学生提供令人兴奋的方式，通过 NFL PLAY 60 进行更多运动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/NFL-and-American-Heart-Association-Team-up-to-encourage-kids-to-get-active-at-school.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/NFL-and-American-Heart-Association-Team-up-to-encourage-kids-to-get-active-at-school.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5faef4f7-115c-4080-97d1-4910e7d77bbe Fri, 08 Sep 2023 17:04:00 -0400 NFL and American Heart Association team up to encourage kids to get active at school
研究人员使用机器学习在临床试验前预测药物批准机会开发新药对于发现创新疗法和预防疾病至关重要。这不仅对于推动医学发展至关重要，而且对于人类的整体健康和福祉也至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Researchers-use-machine-learning-to-predict-drug-approval-chances-before-clinical-trials.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Researchers-use-machine-learning-to-predict-drug-approval-chances-before-clinical-trials.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e810234c-fb13-4f07-a06c-ae6d850d7a07 Fri, 08 Sep 2023 16:59:00 -0400 Researchers use machine learning to predict drug approval chances before clinical trials
UTHealth 休斯顿医学院的学生从与休斯顿德州人队的丰富经验中带回了重要的教训今年夏天，通过与休斯敦德州人队的临床轮换，对职业运动和骨科医学领域有了罕见的了解。 UTHealth 休斯顿麦戈文医学院的四年级学生阿娜丽莎·纳罗 (Analisa Narro) 从丰富的经历中带回了重要的经验教训。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/UTHealth-Houston-medical-student-brings-back-key-lessons-from-enriching-experience-with-Houston-Texans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/UTHealth-Houston-medical-student-brings-back-key-lessons-from-enriching-experience-with-Houston-Texans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6e343cb5-316c-400b-b6b0-b39b183c27f3 Fri, 08 Sep 2023 16:52:00 -0400 UTHealth Houston medical student brings back key lessons from enriching experience with Houston Texans
TTUHSC 埃尔帕索的社区参与工作有助于解决 COVID-19 差异2020 年夏天，埃尔帕索 TTUHSC 急诊医学系主任、医学博士 Edward Michelson 制定了一套新的日常安排。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/TTUHSC-El-Pasos-community-engagement-efforts-helped-address-COVID-19-disparities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/TTUHSC-El-Pasos-community-engagement-efforts-helped-address-COVID-19-disparities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d1154939-ce27-444d-ad76-6d3e5302bc03 Fri, 08 Sep 2023 16:45:00 -0400 TTUHSC El Paso's community engagement efforts helped address COVID-19 disparities
英国发现的 SARS-CoV-2 变种的最新更新英国卫生安全局 (UKHSA) 发布了 SARS-CoV-2 变异监测和评估技术简报 53。其中包含对新出现的 BA.2.86 变异的最新流行病学和基因组分析。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Latest-updates-on-SARS-CoV-2-variants-identified-in-the-UK.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Latest-updates-on-SARS-CoV-2-variants-identified-in-the-UK.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67dd4237-916b-4a5f-9b8a-19deb1f9eebb Fri, 08 Sep 2023 16:40:00 -0400 Latest updates on SARS-CoV-2 variants identified in the UK
